name: TransferringADLOrIADL
title: Transferring (ADL or IADL)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of transferring (ADL/IADL) ability.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's ability to transfer from one position/setting to another as an adl/iadl.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Transferring (ADL or IADL).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Transferring (ADL or IADL).)
